list_definition.definition: a (small) sum taken off the price of something

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The shopkeeper gave me a discount of 20%.

list_definition.definition: to leave aside as something not to be considered

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: You can discount most of what he says – it’s nearly all lies!
